content.description:
Ais te adductumadduco, -ere, -uxi, -uctum: to influence litteris quas exigenti tibi de morte 
avunculi mei scripsi, cupere cognoscere, quos ego 
Miseni relictus (id enim ingressusingredior, -i, -gressus sum = incipio, -ere abruperamabrumpo, -ere, -rupi: to break off) 
non solum metus verum etiam casus pertulerimperfero, -ferre, -tuli = patior, -i.
content.question: In line 3, id enim ingressus abruperam is translated

choices.label: for having started this, I had broken off
for he had begun to break off from this
for I had begun to break off from this
for he, having begun, had broken off

content.answer: for having started this, I had broken off

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
